definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
to invite/to recruit/to levy (taxes)/to draft (troops)/phenomenon/symptom/characteristic sign (used as proof)/evidence
journey/trip/expedition/to go on long campaign/to attack

sentences.english: She even goes to suggest that 'it's women who suppress the sexuality of other women.'
sentences.chinese: 她甚至指出，“是女人抑制了其它女人的性征”。

sentences.english: They are sexually mature at this age and begin to participate in the breeding migrations.
sentences.chinese: 在这个时候它们性征发育成熟并开始参与繁殖大迁徙。

sentences.english: Secondary sexual characteristics development and age at menarche are different in urban and rural girls.
sentences.chinese: 第二性征发育和月经初潮年龄存在城乡差异。

sentences.english: Sexy to the performance of secondary sexual characteristics, divided naked and reveal shape two categories.
sentences.chinese: 性感多以表现第二性征为主，分露体和露形两大类。

sentences.english: Fish have been badly hit by man-made gender-bending chemicals.
sentences.chinese: 人为的改变性征的化学物对鱼类的影响特别大。

sentences.english: His age is that when secondary sexual characteristics appear.
Female secondary sexual characteristics develop normally.
sentences.chinese: 有正常女性第二性征发育。

sentences.english: As a boy adolescence, his secondary sex characteristics develop.
sentences.chinese: 作为一个青春期男孩，这是他的第二性征在发展。
“人类的性征是非常的复杂的，”他说。

sentences.english: During adolescence, boys and girls will take on secondary sexual characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 到了青春期，少男少女们会出现副性征。

sentences.english: The breast is a secondary sex organ.
sentences.chinese: 乳腺是属于第二性征器官。

definition: testosterone/also written 睾甾酮[gao1 zai1 tong2]
